dialogue.text: Hmm, I don't think I've seen you around here before.

dialogue.name: Dog
dialogue.text: (what should i say to a cat?)
Meow indeed. I agree with you.
But what about the economy? How does that make you feel?

hint.name: Dog
hint.text: (how do i feel about the economy?)

dialogue.text: It's a cat-astrophe! I'm pawsitively enraged!
I'm glad you're understanding. We'd make fine furriends

hint.name: Dog
hint.text: (how do i feel about making new friends?)

win_dialogue.name: note:
win_dialogue.text: There is only one cat for this demo so far. Stay tuned for more cats and a story!

lose_dialogue.text: You're not a cat, are you?
